name: Phase 4-3
description:
One of the biggest books you'll ever see, is there in VIT. Hidden in there, the answer to this question lays bare. 
 It's size hides a secret. Oh! You haven't taken a peek yet? Find the page, the line. Translate it, and the points are thine

questions.title: Big Book Booty
questions.description:
One of the biggest books you'll ever see, is there in VIT. Hidden in there, the answer to this question lays bare. 
 It's size hides a secret. Oh! You haven't taken a peek yet? Find the page, the line. Translate it, and the points are thine. (Note:This question involves no QR)
questions.answer: Hard of access, nought searching out, with partial hand. The king who rules, shall sink and perish from the land.
